title: The Campaign
description: The authors of Embrace the Serpent return with more suspense, drama, political intrigue and mystery--and plenty of Washington insider knowledge. Robert Grant is a conservative senator from Georgia running for re-election. Targeted as a scapegoat by the staff of the President, Grant must survive a character assassination attempt and clear his name, solve a murder and bring down a presidency--all in the ten days before the November election.
author: Marilyn Tucker Quayle
